import NavComp from '../components/NavComp'; import Collapse from 'react-bootstrap/Collapse'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import RandomMonster1 from '../randomMaster'; import {randomMonsterInfo, randomLandMark, randomTreasure, randomVerb,randomNPCinfo, numberOfMonsters, NumberOfNPC, randomEffect} from "../randomMaster" import Reuslt from "./result" import useRandom from './useRandom'; export default function Encounter() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const [level, setLevel ] = useState(1-5) const {verb,setVerb, landmark,setLandMark,treasure,setTreasure,npc,setNPC, monster,setMonster,numberMonster,setNumberMonster,numberNPC,setNumberNPC,randomLandMarkEffect,setRandomEffect} = useRandom() const clickHandle = event => { event.preventDefault() RandomMonster1(level) setVerb(randomVerb) setLandMark(randomLandMark) setMonster(randomMonsterInfo) setTreasure(randomTreasure) setNPC(randomNPCinfo) setNumberNPC(NumberOfNPC) setNumberMonster(numberOfMonsters) setRandomEffect(randomEffect) } return ( <>

{/*
setOpen(!open)} aria-controls="example-collapse-text" aria-expanded={open} >

{monster}

Anim pariatur cliche reprehenderit, enim eiusmod high life accusamus terry richardson ad squid. Nihil anim keffiyeh helvetica, craft beer labore wes anderson cred nesciunt sapiente ea proident.
*/}
{/*

They are {numberMonster} {monster} at {landmark} The {monster} is {verb}

{treasure}

*/} ) }
